mapper.insert: insert into store(name, count, item_id, version) values (#{name}, #{count}, #{itemId}, 0)
mapper.select: select count from store where item_id = #{itemId}
select version from store where item_id = #{itemId}
mapper.update: update store set count = count + #{count}, version = version + 1 where item_id = #{itemId} and count + #{count} >= 0 and version = (select * from (select version from store where item_id = #{itemId}) as temp)
